title: Librarian

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Every two nights, you learn two players and a non-factional role you cannot win with.
- One of those two players is that role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Have the Town win the game.
Icon URL: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1183302777733140501/1183302801233817690/Icon_librarian.png?ex=6587d79c&is=6575629c&hm=a90e4dba9c31b4ff49451ff7b825982ba7e63a8f50941e54a4ce7e81b5b2fca6&

desc:
Post 4576
*"Certainly madam, under normal circumstances, you may borrow the Codex Malificarium from the library vaults. However, you do not seem to be a member."*
